Description: Pottery ostracon bearing 4 lines of Greek. Receipt for dike tax.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (392588) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/392588)
Almásy-Martin and Duttenhöfer 2019 / Greek tax receipts from Abydos in the British Museum (no.1; 86-86)
